caption: nhl.com
description: Just when you thought you'd seen it all...
message:
Last night as Anders Nilsson led the #Canucks onto the ice at the Canadian Tire Centre in Ottawa, there was an eerie silence consuming the rink. Any moment now, Thunderstruck, Kickstart my Heart or Welcome to the Jungle would begin blaring, thought everyone.

Nadda. Nothing. Zilch.

description: Hey guys! Sorry I haven't blogged in a while, all my energy and focus was on the start of the season and picking up where I left off from last year. We're obviously not happy about how we've started this year, but it's early and the best is yet to come. Hopefully that starts tonight in Ottawa.

description: Gadjovich was drafted by the Canucks in the second round, 55th overall, of the 2017 NHL Entry Draft.
message:
#Canucks sign Jonah Gadjovich to a three-year entry level contract. 

Over the course of four seasons in the OHL, the 6’2”, 209-pound forward has accumulated 116 points (69-47-116) in 194 regular season games and nine points (5-4-9) in 26 playoff games with Owen Sound.
